data.title: Brace Sproul - Head Of Applied AI at LangChain
data.snippet:
Join Prog.AI to see contacts

### Summary

ðŸ¤©

Rockstar

Brace Sproul is Head of Applied AI at LangChain in the San Francisco Bay Area, leading applied work on agents, orchestration frameworks, and evaluation/observability after six years in software engineering. Known as a "trace tackler" at LangChain, he focuses on observability and debugging complex agent behavior while contributing to flagship open-source projects like langchainjs, LangGraph, Open Canvas, and chat-langchain. He combines product-minded fullâ€‘stack engineering with prior founder and technical lead experience to translate research prototypes into polished, production-ready tooling. Brace also consults on agent design and orchestration, helping teams operationalize LLM systems and improve evaluation workflows. [...] Contributions:26 reviews, 259 PRs, 296 pushes in 5 months

Contributions summary:Brace appears to be a full-stack developer primarily focused on implementing new features and improving the user interface of the chat application. Their contributions include creating a simple chatbot functionality, refactoring existing code, and implementing new UI components. These changes span both frontend and backend aspects of the application, from the creation of content composer components to the definition of API endpoints.

data.title: How LangChain Found a Trusted Partner for Their Sandbox Needs
data.snippet:
As a leader in openâ€‘source agent development, LangChainâ€™s bread and butter is building, orchestrating, and deploying agents seamlessly for developers and nonâ€‘technical users alike. To advance this mission, Brace Sproul, Head of Applied AI, and his team built a cloudâ€‘hosted coding agent that runs autonomously end to end. To open-source it reliably, they needed to nail one thing: their sandbox partner. [...] And the team doesnâ€™t stop at attentive support. They continuously evolve the platform based on LangChainâ€™s feedback. By actively seeking input and implementing improvements quickly, Daytona keeps LangChain focused on their core projects and pushes them further ahead in the fast-moving AI space.

#### The fact that Daytona is always so engaged and responsive is one of the main reasons why we chose them. Working with them has been seamless.

Brace Sproul

Head of Applied AI at LangChain

###### 03 -- RESULT

### LangChain Spins Up 4000 Sandboxes Every Month with Daytona
